Metadata.title: Emin Bugra Saral
Metadata.description: Open source life of Emin Bugra Saral.
Metadata.name: Emin Bugra Saral

Info.title: info
Info.text:
Birth: September 28, 1988. Of / Trabzon / Türkiye.

Education:

Bachelor in Computer Science, Koç University, Istanbul.

Work Experience:

Software Engineering, Project Management, Team Leading, Activism.

Current Status:

Unemployed. I'm trying to switch from software engineering to any kind of art, consultancy or managerial positions. Ideal position(s): Chief Spirit Officer, People & Project Manager, (Multi-Dimensional) Team Management, or Director. Your support or help is appreciated.

Talents:

Fast learner, visionary leading, mentorship, creative ideation, problem solving, attention to detail, writing, acting, directing, photography, pencil drawing, empathy, spiritual / mental enhancement, dancing.

Topics of Interest:

Art, dark humor, technology, science, health, psychology, sociology, economics, philosophy, literature, religion, cinema, music, dance, history, and more...

Lived in:

Istanbul (Türkiye), Bordeaux (France), San Jose (USA), Munich (Germany), Currently: Trabzon (Türkiye).

TouchSensei.title: Touch Sensei (mobile game)
TouchSensei.text: Join Touch Sensei on an emotional journey! Move your finger to unlock feelings, discover secrets, and explore a world of unique textures. Try it now.

CB.title: CB - Under construction
CB.text: A platform where I share my theories, articles, projects and work for a better future for everyone.

EBSLifeSolutions.title: EBS Life Solutions - In the establishment phase
EBSLifeSolutions.text: I offer a professional and compassionate approach to overcoming life’s challenges, grounded in over 20 years of rich personal experience. I offer ideal and lasting solutions for you to deal with the negativity that hinders the luck factor.

Blog.title: Blog (www.saral.blog) - Archived...
Blog.text: A sincere and honest collection of content where my essays, poems, stories, and ideas are reflected outward. I have decided to end this blogging journey to focus on bringing my ideas and projects, along with their details, into my professional career.

Medium.title: Old Blog (medium.com/@ebsaral) - Only in English
Medium.text: A collection of content that was written without enough care and is no longer being updated.

SoundCloud.text: A platform where I amateurishly reflect my interest in music.

LegalWarning.title: < A CLEAR, OPTIMIST & FRIENDLY WARNING >
LegalWarning.text:
I do not consent to the gratuitous use of any information about me, my direct or indirect contributions or my name - whether included or not - in any research, articles, projects or actions involving financial gain. You are required to communicate with me verbally (face-to-face, directly) or in writing to work together on any of your projects or ideas. No evidence or content will be used against you.

You must refrain from any direct or indirect action that harms my biological or physiological integrity (my health). Your assumptions about me become reality for you and do not reflect my reality. No communication channel belonging to me is intended as a threat. Every content is meant to be a warning and/or has an educational purpose.

It is strictly forbidden to test or question my honesty and good faith. It is imperative that you ask questions so that we can build a healthy communication or relationship. It is already impossible for you to use any information, content, sound, image or writing you have about me against me. If you try otherwise, you agree to cause permanent damage to yourself.

Every communication I make starts with one hundred percent trust.

< / A CLEAR, OPTIMIST & FRIENDLY WARNING >

Apology.title: Apology Text
Apology.text: If I have caused any negativity in your life (directly or indirectly) and you are right, I sincerely apologize. If I'm right, you must apologize.
